body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Samuel Rivera and I represent Speedy Cars Inc. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Samuel, my name is Brittany Barnes.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Brittany. Firstly, could you please provide me with your phone number, starting with the area code as zero five five?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is zero five five, two three four, nine six eight one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Brittany. Secondly, could you confirm the spelling of your email address, starting with the letter 'b' as in Bravo?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's b as in Bravo, r i t t a n y dot b a r n e s at g m a i l dot c o m.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Brittany. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now, thank you Samuel.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Brittany. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a wonderful day!
